description: Have you ever been curious about learning how to code but don't know where to start? Perfect you came to the right place. In this very hands on course you'll be easily learning Html 5, which is at the foundation of every single webpage on the internet. We will be going from a blank web page to a hand coded colorful css 3 website in under one hour. Did you know learning how to code can get you a better job and lead to a better future. In this course I encourage you to type every single thing I type because it will give you a deeper understanding and will give you the confidence to create your own websites on your own. Enroll now and lets have some fun coding in html 5 & css3 and successfully create your first portfolio piece!
title: Easily Learn HTML 5 From Scratch
